body.name: AROMA® Glass Air Fryer and Countertop Convection Oven with Powerful 360Crispy™ Technology (3 Quart), White
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 25 mins

features: FAST & CRISPY: Aroma’s new 360Crispy technology uses powerful 360-degree heat circulation to fry crispier, crunchier food in minutes. Get dinner on the table even faster!
GORGEOUS GLASS: Watch your food crisp up inside the glass pot to prevent overcooking. This countertop oven blends elegance and efficiency with glass and a gold logo.
PERFECT SIZE: Upgrade your kitchen with a small oven – perfect for couples or dorms! The mini air fryer has a 3-quart frying basket for crispy fries, wings, veggies, and more.
SUPER EFFICIENT: Turn the dial to adjust the 40-minute timer with suggested durations for 5 popular air fried dishes. Cutting-edge air circulation is the key to fast, even cooking.
CLEAN & HEALTHY: No more chemicals! Aroma’s premium glass air fryer is super easy to clean by hand or in the dishwasher. Plus, it’s completely non-toxic without any coatings.
body.description: "The Aroma® Glass Air Fryer wraps powerful technology in beautiful materials. Display this gorgeous convection oven on your countertop and fry crispy, flavorful food at home with little to no oil. 360Crispy heat circulation is the future of frying, and you can set the perfect temperature with a single touch. This air cooker is equipped with strong, efficient fans that circulate 360-degree dry heat to achieve a lighter, crispier texture. With 360Crispy technology, you can air fry faster and more efficiently at lower temperatures. Turn the adjustable time dial and watch your fries, wings, or veggies crisp up in the premium glass basket. Ding! This mini air fryer cooks food faster and more evenly than a small oven – plus, there’s no preheating required. Aroma combines elegant aesthetics with unmatched cooking efficiency. Savor that healthy crunch at home with 360Crispy!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great works great
reviews.reviewText: Enough to make dinner for 2-3 people. Heats up super fast. Cord is sturdy, does not run hot. This air fryer is Simple yet effective, very durable and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this Air Fryer!! firstly it is cute as hell on my countertop, second, it is glass therefore you can see the food as it cooks. We use it as a microwave to reheat food, it's quick thank goodness for the glass because the food would burn. We also use it to cook wings and fries and it works great, I strongly suggest that you watch your food to avoid over cooking/heating as it heats and cooks very fast. Thirdly, it's easy for the kids to operate, I have 2 teenagers that are always hungry, they don't have any issues using this Air Fryer. I tell you it's worth the money I paid for it. Get yours today, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great air fryer!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! He uses it almost daily and I like the aesthetic look it has so I can keep it on the countertop. Doesn’t take up much room and it works amazingly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars I like the glass
reviews.reviewText: Pros: 1) glass part , only metal is the coated grate for food to sit on 2) can see without opening how the food is cooking or overcooking 3) settings are simple and spot on for what I’ve cooked 4) perfect size for one or two people and doesn’t require a lot of space 4) easy to cleanCons: 1) handle is a little wiggly 2) my main complaint is that it is difficult to find the right position for the red light to come on when sliding the glass part into place. There is a slot for it but I have to move around a bit to get the red light on. 3) second complaint is when I do get the glass container positioned so the red light will come on and the heating will begin it will go off after a minute or two and I have to reposition the glass container. That’s a real hassle for when you set it and walk away only to find later it’s not cooking even though the timer is still going. 4) I followed directions to off-gas the air fryer and did it outside on my patio. The smell was INTENSE. The smell was so strong I continued to let it heat up for 20 minutes at a time for two hours. Only then did I think it was safe enough to bring in the house. Then I washed it twice in soap and water, air drying in between washes. No smell after washing but jeez I had serious doubts the chemical smell would ever come out when off-gassing it. 5) the top of the whir handle has a light brown burn mark on it and I have no idea how that happened as the handle part isn’t place directly under the heat source.So I would return but I missed the return date. I’m using it but wish it was a better product. The concept of glass is awesome, but the amount of off-gassing was disturbing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean
reviews.reviewText: Love that I can see food cooking through the glassIt’s perfect size for one person mealsAnd it’s cute on the counter and doesn’t take up much space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a smaller fryer but it serves me well. When I first turned it on I didn’t think it was working. It runs real quiet. The cleanup is a breeze. I use it more than my bigger air fryer oven. Best investment ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Won’t stay on
reviews.reviewText: Ugh. I really wanted this to work! The size is perfect for one and it isn’t made of nonstick material. However, while running the initial offgas cycle, I’ve had to go in and jiggle the pot to connect about four times in five minutes. That doesn’t work for me. Sending it back and continuing the search for a small, glass air fryer. Junk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lower wattage, single temperature setting, easiest clean up ever
reviews.reviewText: WHY THIS UNITMy last air fryer stopped working (Elite Platinum EAF-05SS Digital 3.2Qt Hot Air Fryer after 2+ years of use. That unit was 1400-Watts, Oil-Less Healthy Cooker, Temp/Timer Settings, PFOA/PTFE F)I chose that unit because it had a 304 grade Stainless Steel Basket; dishwasher safe and BPA-free.LIKES. Lower wattage (900 watts) convection air fryer (360-degree dry heat ). Small 3-quart glass basket. No pre-heating required. No oil required, but I lightly spray my meats for a crunchier exterior. Able to fit 8 wing pieces in the container, so have to batch cook them. Just set the timer for the given food item (pictures and recommended times on top of the unit). There is a loud timer bell when the food is finished.. Chicken wings and thighs were crunchy, moist and tender. Clean up was a breeze. Just wait 30 mins for the glass container to cool and wash with warm soapy waterDISLIKES. There is a 1-time, 30-min break-in time to burn off any chemicals/odors from the glass and/or frying rack. It emits a strong odor, so make sure your area is well ventilated. There were no subsequent issues with material odors after the break-in process.. Not sure what material the removable frying rack is made of (non-stick surface with rubber legs). If it is Teflon, then it defeats the purpose of a healthy cook surface. I need to know if it is PFOA/PTFE free. The rack elevates your food just enough so the convection and heat circulation thoroughly cooks your food.. Will contact manufacturer to find out about fryer rack material and whether a stainless steel rack can be used in the glass basketUSED FOR: 2-person meals of air fried chicken wings, chicken thighs, sweet potato fries. Will try skinless chicken next time as a healthier alternative2/15/23 UPDATEAir fried a thick ribeye steak, 12 mins. PERFECT!!Juicy, tender, lightly pink in the middle. Delicious.
